details.purpose: To record the findings of a Pure Tone Audiogram

items.items: Threshold at which the sound frequency was heard.
Indication of cooperation of patient which may have impact on outcome of test.
Both ears test normally by the audiogram.
The audiogram is normal for the left ear.
The audiogram is normal for the right ear.
Details of audiometer used to record audiogram.
Порог, при котором звук (частота) становиится слышимым.
Отметка, что пациент понимает и выполняет требования исследователя.
